channel.title: How to make a Vinegar/Baking Soda Bomb
channel.description:
This thread will teach you how to make a vinegar/baking soda bomb with everyday stuff you have in your kitchen. Just follow the instructions, its simpleeee.
[b]Step 1: -Ingredients-[/b] [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/ToneCore/123344.jpg[/img]
-A plastic water bottle - the only ones I have been succesful with are the really cheap ones and a Dasani one works well too. -Baking soda - about 2 tbsp per bomb. -Vinegar - about a cup (8 oz.) per bomb. -A plastic bag - doesn't matter if its ziplock or not, it just has to have a corner.
[b]Step 2: -The Bomb-[/b]
Start by filling the bottle half full with vinegar. Then cut the bag as shown. [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/ToneCore/vbv.jpg[/img]
Put the bag into the mouth of the bottle as shown, and fill it with 2 tbsp. (roughly) of baking soda. [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/ToneCore/sdfsdfsdf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/ToneCore/FCV9OCL5AHEZ0R6ESW.MEDIUM.jpg[/img]
Push the bag with the baking soda down into the bottle, but don't let the contents mix. [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/ToneCore/sdfsdfdgfg.jpg[/img]
You are now ready to detonate.
[b]Step 3: -DETONATE-[/b]
When you have found a safe place to blow it up, such as the street (not your garage, or your room, or secret underground lab), start shaking the bottle to mix the active ingredients. The bottle will start to fizz up and expand, so wait about 8 seconds to charge it up, then either throw it at the ground or up in the air. You don't want to hit the cap on the ground, or it will just let all the compressed air out in a non-exciting way. You want to hit the side or bottom of the bottle, either way it will blow out the bottom.
[u]Note:[/u] Its good to make at least 15 of these. Play bottle wars. Just don't aim for their faces.
[u]Disclaimer:[/u] I'm not responsible for burning out your eyes, breaking your nose from the contents of pressure under the cap from blowing off, or lets just say: Im not responsible for you being an idiot.
[u]Credits:[/u] Google for the Recipe. Me and Roy for the pictures.
Have funn :].

item.title: How to make a Vinegar/Baking Soda Bomb
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:4, topic:144006”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=197488.msg1762627#msg1762627 date=1190012945]

im sure no one else has figured this out before. you put vinegar and baking soda toether and it expands ? no way

end of sarcasm

this is pretty obvios, im sure everyone knows how to do this

Fuck you.
Has anyone else posted this before? No. So stfu, he’s educating.

Great job man, if I could give you rep I would. This is the first actual detailed tutorial I’ve seen in a while. This is the kind of thing that keeps me in the community. My only criticism is to add a disclaimer that makes you not liable for the bad shit that happens.
[/quote]

Who needs a disclaimer? The only people dumb enough to injure themselves aren’t smart enough to press charges.[/quote]I’ll remind you of the lawsuit against McDonald’s over a woman who sustained burns from spilling her coffee and was not warned by the cup that it might happen.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a Vinegar/Baking Soda Bomb
item.dc:creator: @Adio990 Adio990
item.description:
@Adio990 wrote:

This thread will teach you how to make a vinegar/baking soda bomb with everyday stuff you have in your kitchen.
Just follow the instructions, its simpleeee.

Step 1: -Ingredients-

-A plastic water bottle - the only ones I have been succesful with are the really cheap ones and a Dasani one works well too.
-Baking soda - about 2 tbsp per bomb.
-Vinegar - about a cup (8 oz.) per bomb.
-A plastic bag - doesn’t matter if its ziplock or not, it just has to have a corner.

Step 2: -The Bomb-

Start by filling the bottle half full with vinegar. Then cut the bag as shown.

Put the bag into the mouth of the bottle as shown, and fill it with 2 tbsp. (roughly) of baking soda.

Push the bag with the baking soda down into the bottle, but don’t let the contents mix.

You are now ready to detonate.

Step 3: -DETONATE-

When you have found a safe place to blow it up, such as the street (not your garage, or your room, or secret underground lab), start shaking the bottle to mix the active ingredients. The bottle will start to fizz up and expand, so wait about 8 seconds to charge it up, then either throw it at the ground or up in the air. You don’t want to hit the cap on the ground, or it will just let all the compressed air out in a non-exciting way. You want to hit the side or bottom of the bottle, either way it will blow out the bottom.

Note:
Its good to make at least 15 of these. Play bottle wars. Just don’t aim for their faces.

Disclaimer:
I’m not responsible for burning out your eyes, breaking your nose from the contents of pressure under the cap from blowing off, or lets just say: Im not responsible for you being an idiot.

Credits:
Google for the Recipe.
Me and Roy for the pictures.

Have funn :].

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a Vinegar/Baking Soda Bomb
